nodes.text: The Pyke blaster pistol was a model of blaster pistol was owned by Lom Pyke and the Pyke Syndicate.

In 20 BBY, after joining Darth Maul's Shadow Collective, the Pyke Syndicate used this weapon at the takeover of Sundari. Lom Pyke was seen wielding this type of blaster pistol before Savage Opress killed several Mandalorian policemen.
